articles.title: Asics develops sneakers with world's smallest carbon footprint - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Japanese maker joins global race for low-carbon shoemaking
articles.content:
TOKYO -- Japanese sports gear maker Asics has developed sneakers whose carbon footprint is less than half that of those formerly considered the low-emissions record holder.
The new sneakers emit 1.9… [+276 chars]

articles.title: This Singaporean tufting artist can turn anything into a rug – and is popular for her pet portraits - cnalifestyle.channelnewsasia.com
articles.description: In this week's installment of Creative Capital, meet Rachael Wee, who left a job in graphic design to start her own tufting studio, Habichl. 90 per cent of her commissions are pet portraits. Oh, and also, Sam Smith follows her on Instagram.
articles.content:
DO YOU SELL MORE RUGS THESE DAYS OR SMALLER PIECES?
I was pleasantly surprised at the reception of my latest rug drop, which consisted entirely of wall hangings. They nearly sold out within three ho… [+1842 chars]

articles.title: Sora Ma wins Best Supporting Actress at Asia Contents Awards for sultry hostess character in This Land Is Mine - cnalifestyle.channelnewsasia.com
articles.description: The actress was recognised for her turn in the period drama – certainly a good showing, considering it was her first English-language project.
articles.content:
Actress Sora Ma took home her first acting award at the fourth Asia Contents Awards ceremony held in Busan, Korea on Oct 8 at the BIFF Theatre, Busan Cinema Centre.

articles.description: After representing Singapore and competing at the top of their sports, swimmer Joscelin Yeo and netball player Zhang Tingjun hope to pass on their biggest takeaways to kids at their new wilderness survival camps.
